= Introduction =
 * Extract all files in `jeza.ioFTPD.ZipScript_*.zip` to `/scripts/jeza.ioFTPD.ZipScript`
  * _ICSharpCode.SharpZipLib.dll_
  * _jeza.ioFTPD.Framework.dll_
  * _jeza.ioFTPD.ZipScript.exe_
  * _taglib-sharp.dll_
 * Open `ioFTPD.ini`
 * Under `[Events]` add:
{{{
OnUploadComplete	= EXEC ..\scripts\jeza.ioFTPD.ZipScript\jeza.ioFTPD.ZipScript.exe upload
}}}
 * Under `[FTP_Custom_Commands]` add:
{{{
rescan	= EXEC ..\scripts\jeza.ioFTPD.ZipScript\jeza.ioFTPD.ZipScript.exe rescan
}}}
